name: Greek Invoker
description:
Submission for Extra Jam 3, made in a single day.

"Try to win over the favor of the Gods with 15 or less spells, invoking their powers"

  • Every spell can be invoked by first selecting it and then a based on its nature selecting other spells or free slots.
  • Some of the spells are not identified by you, so you don't know what will happen when you will invoke them.
  • Your goal is to use all the spells and reach the maximum possible favor.

There are two game modes (for now):

  • Labors (tutorial/campaign)
  • Quests (freeplay)
